title: Bug 19458[Navigator] Copy Project dialog UI problems
description: Bug 19458[Navigator] Copy Project dialog UI problems this is inred text.
OB: When copying a project using the 'Copy Project' dialog:
EB: When copying a project using the 'Copy Project' dialog, the following UI problems are observed:
SR:
To fix the UI problems in the 'Copy Project' dialog, please follow these steps:
1. Create a single project, for example, named 'test'.
2. Copy and paste the project.
3. In the 'Copy Project' dialog:
   a. Even if 'Use default location' is checked, the user should still be able to select and view/copy the default location from the edit box below.
   b. Provide an option to choose a path close to the default location.
